DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate concurrent validity ( correlation coefficient score 1 time point ) Brain Performance Test ( BPT , Lumos Labs , Inc. ) validate third party computerized assessment .
DOC.detailed_description: Each subject complete two session , approximately 1 hour total duration , approximately 2 week apart total duration participation 2 hour 2 week
DOC.criteria: Electronically sign inform consent 18 year age older Native EnglishSpeaker Consistent access computer stable internet connection Under 18 year age Native language English Visual impairment impedes computer use Has take cognitive assessment do cognitive training past year
